title: Instagram usage frequency in the United States 2019
summary: The Instagram usage Response in the United States was Response Several_times_a_week , who made 37 respondents .
The most usage Response was Several_times_a_month , with just 0 respondents .

In second place was Response Daily with 22 respondents ; third place went to Response Several_times_a_day with 37 respondents ; fourth place went to Response Don't_know with 0 respondents and fifth place went to Response Weekly , who made 9 respondents .
gold: As of the third quarter of 2019 , it was found that 37 percent of Instagram users in the United States accessed the photo sharing app several times a day . A further 22 percent of respondents claimed that they used Instagram on a daily basis .
